par.name: e
par.note: An Element object reference or an id string.

par.name: t
par.note: The total time for the animation, in milliseconds.

par.name: a
par.note: Acceleration type: 0=none, 1=sine(fast start, slow at end), 2=cosine(slow start, fast at end). This is optional, the default is 0.

par.name: oe
par.note: The onEnd handler. It can be a function reference or a string. It will be executed at the completion of the animation. This is optional.
